definition: to be adjusted to uniformity (usually of weights and measures) (idiom)
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Their _(2)_ are timed to go together perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 他们的动作非常整齐划一。

sentences.english: Now, instead of marching as one, we were ready to get loose.
sentences.chinese: 现在，没有了整齐划一的行进，队伍开始变得松散了。

sentences.english: Two hundred and ninety athletes did a broadcast gymnastics show which was neat and uniform.
sentences.chinese: 290名运动员表演的广播体操整齐划一。

sentences.english: They have the same groomed swing that they repeat time and time again.
sentences.chinese: 他们一遍一遍地重复著整齐划一的挥杆方式。

sentences.english: It can lead to tremendous disaster and risk.
sentences.chinese: 整齐划一反而会带来巨大的灾难和风险。

definition: orderly/neat/even/tidy
everything clear and in good order (idiom); neat and tidy
in formation (military)
(of troops) in neat formation/(fig.) orderly
square-shaped formation (military)/phalanx/(math.) matrix
sonorous/resounding/fig. resounding words
in perfect order
neat and tidy
formation
to dress (troops)/to line up (to arrange in a straight line)
disordered and in a mess (idiom); all mixed up and chaotic
row/horizontal troop formation
all speaking together/in chorus
to match (sb's) stride

in a mess/in a jumble/chaotic
